I created these apps to provide visualizations that are easily accessible to a broader audience. Feel free to browse around! These apps also have an associated publication that gives more context on the research background.

## White Pine Blister Rust

[![](images/wpbr.png){width=100%}](https://angelchen.shinyapps.io/WPBR/)

Check out the probability of white pine blister rust for high-elevation five-needle pine species from 1980 to 2023.

**Links: [app](https://angelchen.shinyapps.io/WPBR/), [associated publication](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-025-05382-1)**

## Fire in the Everglades

[![](images/fires.png){width=100%}](https://angelchen.shinyapps.io/ENP_fires/)

Explore the total number of fires and years since the last fire across different ecosystems in the Florida Everglades from 1978 to 2023. 

**Links: [app](https://angelchen.shinyapps.io/ENP_fires/), [associated publication](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-025-05917-6)**
